backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in-memory maps for shipments, invoices, clients, payments, accounts, sessions, and rate limiting with authorization mixin and various configuration fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI error‑handling update, listing involved files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, detailing behavior of components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing the Google Maps API key for frontend usage.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with applied global design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling landing UI, tracking form, WhatsApp quotes, and lazy‑loaded dashboards with session‑based routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin detail view showing client info and tabbed shipments and invoices tables.
Form for validating a principal ID and updating a client's profile, with mutation submission and error handling.
Dialog for creating a client login account, validating principal IDs, generating temp passwords, and provisioning account linkage.
Displays all clients with search, refresh, and detail view navigation using fetched client data.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard providing tabbed access to client management, tracking, revenue, login history, and configuration panels.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel to check, enter, and store the Google Geocoding API key with status indicators and setup instructions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that triggers CSV export of all invoices using a mutation and downloads the generated file.
Renders a table of invoices for a client with create and delete dialogs, using query hooks for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Displays client login history with loading, error, and empty states, sorting entries by timestamp.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Provides UI to view, save, and verify the MSG91 API key using related query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Fetches revenue data and shows analytics with a line chart, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Shows a static notice explaining role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Renders a shipments table for a client with create and delete functionality using shipment query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin map panel that conditionally loads Google Maps script and renders shipment markers with error handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches UI errors and displays a styled error screen with options to refresh or copy error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message for users lacking permission to view a section.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap UI card indicating Internet Identity admin setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form handling authentication and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button for admin users that triggers session logout and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated dialog for collecting profile details; form submits and closes but is unused.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout and WhatsApp support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays client invoices with status badges, errors, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Password change form enforcing validation and calling the password‑update mutation, with error handling and success callback.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Auth container that toggles between login and signup tabs and switches back to login after successful signup.
Login UI supporting password and OTP flows, validating inputs and invoking related authentication mutations with error handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays active and delivered client shipments with authentication checks, error handling, and linkage‑error messaging.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Signup form validating identifier and password fields and submitting new account data, resetting on success.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Provides client session token context with methods to set and clear tokens and exposes authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hooks to check admin bootstrap status and trigger the bootstrap process, updating cached state on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validating them with the backend and handling login with detailed error mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider using AuthClient to manage login state, stored identities, and authentication helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin and client data fetching, including clients, shipments, revenue, and login history with variant response handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode, and custom DFC gold color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable invoice PDF by opening a styled HTML document in a new window and triggering print.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local types for clients, profiles, and login history, and re-exports backend shipment and invoice types.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links for invoice payment reminders and support messages with formatted text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps raw backend auth errors to concise, user‑friendly English messages with special handling for service unavailability and validation cases.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning structured results with clear validation errors.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Extracts readable UI messages from React Query errors and delegates auth‑related errors to the clientAuthErrors mapper.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a target element with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing versions, known issues, existing features, and pending backend feature requests.
